transcript.text: Hi! I am cobbling together a short notice inspiration trip.
Hello! To help you plan your short notice trip, could you please tell me your desired destination, travel dates, and the number of travelers?
I'm leaning toward Zurich next Saturday evening, back the Monday after that around noon — can you shape something Lufthansa Group exclusive?
Thank you for sharing your travel plans! Could you please let me know the number of travelers for this trip?
Please keep the origin flexible: use my nearest airport if helpful, otherwise anything within 100km of my current spot in Zaprešić.
Thank you for sharing your travel plans! Could you please let me know the number of travelers for this trip?
If Zurich can't work, surface an alternative Central European city that still fits those dates. Include the converted ISO dates so I can double-check.
Thank you for sharing your travel plans! Could you please let me know the number of travelers for this trip?
One more detail: if there is an overnight return, highlight the layover duration.
Thank you for sharing your travel plans! Could you please let me know the number of travelers for this trip?
